title: What are some electronic devices that can be manufactured and sold? - Quora

response.answer_text: Manufactured in the home and be a competitive price to the market? Not many things. It has to be a unique market and a product with a high perceived value. I have sold LED lights and staffs to Renaissance Faire people for a while. A Merlin’s Staff sells well. Since they don’t always have electricity high power LED lanterns sell. Art work with electronics might sell. Maybe star constellations with LEDs. Various colored LEDs for red giants (Taurus) or blue giants. Flickering or fading LEDs are on the market. Multicolored fading ones for variable stars. Electronic Goldmine has a lot of flickering, blinking and fading LED of all colors. Orion would have a popular recognizable pattern with a good variety of stars in it. Most people would not recognize Draco or Taurus.
Dear Raachid, Please clarify your question: do you mean pieces-parts or functional electronic instruments? My email is salama@msala.us Martin
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Rachid Ben Abdelmalek
